What planet are you from It was like another world The party that VC firm Draper Fisher Jurvetson was putting on was in the blimp hangar at Moffett Field There are few stranger buildings And then Tim Draper showed up In a space suit But the portfolio companies for which DFJ threw the party were mostly down to earth There were only a few viral concepts like Hotmail DFJs most famous hit The rest were infrastructure wireless semiconductor photonics and CRM companies And then there was Achex which makes not an aspirin substitute but rather a system that lets consumers pay for online purchases through a checking account instead of with a credit card Personally I use plastic for almost everything but outside of rich cities a sizable portion of the US population doesnt buy this way Achex is targeting retailers that at their physical locations do substantial cash and check transactions Kmarts BlueLightcom is a customer Achex transaction fees are also lower than credit card fees My first take on Achex was that online credit card transactions work well enough so why build a parallel debit system However not everybody on this planet buys things the way we do in the big city Rafe
